sql.query:
INSERT INTO payment_intents
(created, uuid, total, family_uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{NOW_UTC.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd h:mm:ss')}} */, :P2 /* {{pi_uuid}} */, :P3 /* {{charges_sum}} */, :P4 /* {{$_GET.familyid}} */)

INSERT INTO payment_intents_lines
(uuid, paymenttotal, chargetotal, payintent_uuid, enrolcharge_uuid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{'pil_'+UUID.replace('-','')}} */, :P2 /* {{remaining}} */, :P3 /* {{total}} */, :P4 /* {{pi_uuid}} */, :P5 /* {{enrolcharge_uuid}} */)

SELECT value AS application_fee
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'STRIPE_application_fee_percent'

SELECT stripe_currency
FROM locations
WHERE uuid = :P1 /* {{$_POST.location_uuid}} */

SELECT value AS default_currency
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'STRIPE_default_currency'

options.data: No location or default currency has been defined (e.g. USD, AUD). Payments cannot be processed with Stripe until this is rectified. Please adjust your settings or, if this error persists, see your system administrator.

sql.query:
SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'STRIPE_account_id'

SELECT stripe_cust_id
FROM families
WHERE uuid = :P1 /* {{$_GET.familyid}} */

UPDATE payment_intents
SET stripe_charge = :P1 /* {{createPaymentIntent.id}} */
WHERE uuid = :P2 /* {{pi_uuid}} */
